pkgmetadata.longdescription: # pyfreedomproPython library for Freedompro API.Installation------------You can install pyfreedompro with `pip install pyfreedompro`.Example-------```pythonimport asyncioimport pyfreedomproimport aiohttpasync def main(): httpsession = aiohttp.ClientSession(connector=aiohttp.TCPConnector(ssl=False)); response = await pyfreedompro.get_list(httpsession, APY_KEY); print(response); await httpsession.close();loop = asyncio.get_event_loop()loop.run_until_complete(main())```See the complete documentation of the Fredompro API <https://api.freedompro.eu/>.
